name: pnp-list-formatting-faq-grouped
title: Grouped FAQs
shortDescription: This sample uses standard group rendering to provide a list of expandable questions.
longDescription: This sample uses standard group rendering to provide a list of expandable questions. By default, when grouping by a column the column name and the count of grouped items will be included in the group name. This format provides some small tweaks to the group header to only show the value (question in this case). By also hiding the column header and item selection, this format acts like a mini application and could easily be added to a page using the list web part.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
